titleStmt.title: A loyal subjects admonition, or, A true song of Brittains civil wars. Some with blind zeal ... To the tune of General Moncks right march, that was founded before him from Scotland to London, or the Highlanders march.
titleStmt.author: T. J.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Signed at end: "Composed by loyal T.J."
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
